website_summaries.verdict: If you can get past the wobbly base, Tend Secure's $60 Lynx cam has a lot to offer at a truly exceptional value.
pros: Tend Secure's Lynx Indoor camera has 1080p HD live streaming, free 7-day event-based cloud storage and solid facial-recognition software
cons: The Lynx doesn't have any smart home partnerships, audio playback is garbled and its base doesn't hold the camera in place very well

customer_reviews.title: Network connectivity very sketchy
customer_reviews.text: I attempted to connect this camera to 3 different WiFi networks in 3 different locations without success, despite contacting the company's support line. I was able to connect the camera intermittently, but most of the time I was not able to establish a connection or stay connected. If the power was disconnected while the camera was on the network, the camera would not reconnect to the network. I don't know whether this particular unit was defective or whether the product is generally not good. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: The Sundance Kid

customer_reviews.title: Camera goes offline every day.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to keep an eye on our new puppy during the day in her crate while I'm at work. Worked well at first for about a month, now the camera keeps going offline. Unfortunately, I can't do anything to it while I'm at work and it is offline. So, when I get home, I unplug it every night and restart it. During the next day, it goes offline for most of the day. I have an arlo Q that works flawlessly and I'd rather spend a little more to buy that rather than the Lynx Indoor again. Lynx got great review on PC Mag which is why I bought it, but it is not reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Hoo96

customer_reviews.title: Won't maintain connection to router .
customer_reviews.text: Had to return first camera for same reason . Camera will not maintain contact with router , goes off line constantly . Support is non existent . They return calls a couple of days later and don' t answers e-mails . beware . Bought it after reading PC Magazine review . What were they thinking . Friend bought the camera also and had to return for same reason .
customer_reviews.author: Regulator

customer_reviews.title: The reviews are accurate
customer_reviews.text: The reviews on this device are quite accurate in that it really is a hit or miss device. Wall mounting is impossible (see other reviews) and I found the unit constantly turning off whenever I was upstairs in my unit while this device was supposed to be watching my garage. Not worth even trying it folks. Returned mine in less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: HappyCamper

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for a small camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received it yesterday, nice video, pretty good night vision, easy to connect, able to zoom in and out, easy app, motion detector works well when sensitivity is at the highest, alert notification is delayed 4 to 5 seconds after motion detector is activated, able to have invite other to view the camera, user can manually or automatically take video or pictures. Only flaw I can see as of today is that when you unplug the camera, it takes awhile or need to set it up again. Need to read the instructions properly before use.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Asian Springsteen

customer_reviews.title: stoped working after 3 hours
customer_reviews.text: after half day of use just stopped working and not connecting to app anymore. tried everything. payed cheap now will pay the real price. orange led keep blinking probably for some error. but camera not working any more.
customer_reviews.author: artik123

customer_reviews.title: Very good Camera (Pros and Cons review)
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera Pros *Great video resolution *Fast notification to cell phone and ability to easily turn off/on *Easy to view the videos using cell *Easy to install and use including GUI * 7 day free video (awesome) and cheap price Cons *The router distance should be close else you will likely have problems (this may require a repeater) * Should the router go down you likely will have to re-power the camera * The wide angle works well at the expense of faces being smaller on video
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Man

customer_reviews.title: Everything was great when it worked
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great when it worked. But the antennae is too weak to pick up a signal. The router is functioning perfectly, and even after much troubleshooting, the antennae is too weak to pick up signal from a room about 60ft away. While I could go and purchase a wifi extender, this defeats the purpose of buying the "economical" brand. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Hard to configure connectivity
customer_reviews.text: I spent several hours trying to get the camera to connect to my router. When I was lucky enough to get my iPhone to connect to the camera, I could not get the camera to connect to my router, even with the help of customer support. Most of the time the iPhone would not even connect to the camera. When it did, I would find my router in the app's list of networks and attempt to connect the camera to the router. It would always fail. All this was done with the router, camera and iPhone within a one foot range of each other. Blah!
customer_reviews.author: Windchaserb

customer_reviews.title: easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Pros: easy set up, easy to use, great image and features Con: static!!! After contacting the product support I learned that electrician outlets can cause interference and therefore static. Well, it has to be near a plugas the camera isn’t wireless. So, constant static. If you need a quiet feed this would be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sam D. Welbaum

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera for the money. Really easy to install and operate. Use it for watching the kiddos in the basement as they play. It really is nice to be able to check on them. Would recommend the camera to any mom!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Solid camera once the setup is done
customer_reviews.text: Had a little trouble getting it to connect to my wifi. The app was very helpful though once we did get it set up. We use it to watch our apartment while we're both at work and it gives us added security while we're away! Overall great camera and would buy more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Beware of this camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera works great the first time it connects, but better not hope it never disconnects. Because it will never connect easily without a lot of painful tries and do not buy from any reseller unless they are an "official reseller" or Tend will not honor the 1-year manufacturer warranty that is included in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Hayes

customer_reviews.title: TOO SENSITIVE, MAKING IT USELESS
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great. I told a lot of people about it ... until a firmware update in early March 2018 made the camera so sensitive (even on its lowest setting) that notifications come several a minute and had to be turned off. The camera now also fills up the memory so that less than a day can be recorded, because of the sensitivity. Called the company to ask if this could be fixed. They said no and gave a canned answer that tried to make it sound like an improvement - "better sensitivity." True, even on the lowest setting, making it useless...
customer_reviews.author: Camilah

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to get working. Sound was awesome and picture was great, even in the dark. Terrific product for the price! I am looking forward to adding to my one.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Baker

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Love the free cloud service. Be aware that if you have capped data usage this will pull a lot if left on 24/7. I have 3 on wifi and capped me out on suddenlink service. I am going for unlimited data.
customer_reviews.author: David Benson

customer_reviews.title: Easiest affordable camera to install and use.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a variety of security cameras to try out, and this was by far the easiest to figure out. The camera is very good, too. One especially nice feature is that we can add additional cameras to the single app. We will most likely replace some of the other devices with more of these.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the $
customer_reviews.text: I already own a couple of NEST cams ($200 ea) and while this isn't as robust in features and settings, it is very functional and worth the price. Good quality picture. Event detection seems a little inconsistent, but I've also had similar issues with NEST. The app is sometimes frustrating as it can take several attempts to load event history or live view without a full restart of the smartphone. Free cloud storage is a bonus. Stateside tech support has been courteous and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent cameras. Worth their price
customer_reviews.text: Not completely impressed but for the price they are great quality. The motion detection literally detects everything. I had to lower the sensitivity because I was getting tons of alerts but once I did it was better. Don't like that they have to be hooked up to wifi. If you lose wifi for any reason they stop recording and become useless. I wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: John Percy

customer_reviews.title: Economical Solution
customer_reviews.text: Purchased three of these to install in the home of elderly parent. The cameras work beautifully in daylight and in darkness. I had an issue with one of the cameras, but the CSR was very helpful and replaced the camera quickly. I'd definitely recommend this camera to anyone needing a simple solution for viewing activity indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Requires manual reconnect every time wifi goes down
customer_reviews.text: This camera is useless to me. If it disconnects due to wifi loss (common around here), it cannot automatically reconnect itself. Instead, you have to pull the power cable out and press the hardware button for it to reconnect. Ridiculous! I have another security camera by Netamo which is far superior - I should have just bought another one of what I had.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Horrible night time vision camera
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this camera is great during the daytime night vision through a window I wouldn't buy this camera that's what I needed it for and nighttime does not work at all I do not recommend this for anybody that wants to use this camera through a window
customer_reviews.author: reuven solomon

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Netgear AC1200 Router.
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to using this excellent security camera. Unfortunately, it does not work with the router I have - the Netgear AC1200. This information is found hidden on their website, but was not on the Amazon.com product page. I assume it works well with other routers, but no go with this one.
customer_reviews.author: GNH

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is good but there is a delay about 30 to 45 second to send notification
customer_reviews.author: Hesham Medhat

customer_reviews.title: All 3 are good and the Tend Insight has proven to be quite ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 different cameras (Blink, Amcrest, and Tend Insight). All 3 are good and the Tend Insight has proven to be quite reliable. Very clear image and great night vision. The 2 way audio is not so clear but I don't use that very often. App is user friendly as well. Considering buying another one. Only challenge is hiding the USB power cord but I was able to do that 100% in it's current location.
customer_reviews.author: OrnateCactus

customer_reviews.title: Good Security Camera
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera for the price. Was a little glitchy getting set up (reason for four not five stars) and I had to unplug and plug it back in for it to finally finish the setup process. Picture is very clear and features like facial recognition and motion detection alert are a plus. Probably going to purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: I would like to see more options or choices when it comes ...
customer_reviews.text: Totally impressed with this item. With the exception of some of the setup process, this camera is simple and more than adequate. Night vision is exceptional. I would like to see more options or choices when it comes to scheduled recording of events. Specifically, individual schedules on individual days of the week, and some sort of instant record from the phone app with a quick setting for a length of time. However, considering the price of this product, it is everything I paid for it. Most likely will get more to supplement home alarm system.
customer_reviews.author: Monte P Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Fails at it's one job....useless.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with my Comcast router. My iphone sees the camera but will not connect, even though my wireless is 2.4Ghz and this is what is stated in the startup guide. Also, it seems like there's no way to set this up via my computer as the Tend Secure App is Phone only. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Drewniak.j

customer_reviews.title: Set up went perfectly on 1st try.
customer_reviews.text: The camera is much smaller than I expected which is good. Set up went perfectly on the first try. Quality is great. The only down side is it has to be plugged into the wall for power. Also the stand fits a little too loosely. It wobbles too much. But it still works great. One last tid bit....I bought this to see outside a window the infrared reflects off the glass at night so I had to turn it off and keep my porch light on. Works good.
customer_reviews.author: Elissa Nomi

customer_reviews.title: Tend Insights Lynx Indoor 1080P WiFi Home Security Camera
customer_reviews.text: Really great product. Gave me the exact security coverage that I needed. The cloud back is great. The data is available even if someone does make inside your home and destroys the camera.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these, and could not get either one to connect to either an iphone or android phone. The app would continually hang while trying to connect. The device would show up in the app, but it would not connect during setup.
customer_reviews.author: S. Elam

customer_reviews.title: Great camera and cloud storage is free however buggy
customer_reviews.text: Gave one star because the camera's audio didn't work when you trying to listen using a bluetooth headset. I reported the bug to the developers and they cannot or don't know how to fix, blaming my bluetooth headset. However I tested with others and none worked. You can just listen using your phone's speakers or a wired earphones.
customer_reviews.author: LSMM

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing
customer_reviews.text: I use this to monitor my house while away. It gave the peace of mind needed and I didn't have to spend over 200 dollars plus some to get it. It blends in well with my ceiling so most don't even notice it's there. I love that I can also check up on my pets while I'm at work. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Krystle Teague

customer_reviews.title: Setup is super easy, free storage of videos is an enormous ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I can't imagine anything else would beat this. Setup is super easy, free storage of videos is an enormous plus as other security cameras charge monthly fees. PIcture quality is more than sufficient. The app for the phone works great and is simple. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: TA612

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: I really love Insight's cameras. No fees for you service, they save to the cloud until the video expires. If you need it you just download to your phone. I do.wishnthebrecord time was a little.longer when it sensed motion. It tends to record a ton of little clips, but I prefer that to fees.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Once Set Up It’s Great!
customer_reviews.text: The camera was a little tricky to get set up, but once that’s done it has been awesome! The facial recognition is really cool, motion detecting and more. We have it to watch the animals while we’re both away. Probably get a few more to have the whole house covered.
customer_reviews.author: kiara Riches

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and use. Good quality video. During the first 2 weeks of use we have found it to be reliable for detecting and capturing any movement. This little camera is living up to our expectations. I have ordered 2 more. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is that I feel it needs to prove itself over a longer period of time and because I have not as yet used all of the features available. I will recommend it to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob and Joan Mohar

customer_reviews.title: Serviceable, but not perect by any means
customer_reviews.text: Cameras were relatively simlpe to install, even though I am not good with tech stuff. I am somewhat frustrated with how easy it is for someone to hack these, and also you have to re-install them every time they do an update on them.
customer_reviews.author: Selectshopper

customer_reviews.title: Very very good
customer_reviews.text: I hear people talking through it so I recommend a good password or frequent password updates , I have 2 to keep an eye on my mother while I am outside or shopping. Have had for years indoors and they work great still
customer_reviews.author: Julia Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this indoor camera so much I had to have a second one! It works great and has great motion detection as well as night vision. I gave the tech support 3 stars due to the fact that I have never had to use them. Great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Mayton

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I have 7 of these cameras, all mounted with double sided tape to see out my windows at home while I'm away. They work great and I couldn't ask for anything more reliable and clearer for the price and the free cloud. I'm not sure why others have problems connecting them etc.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: My biggest complaint is that the night vision is terrible. I can walk directly in front of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall a decent product. My biggest complaint is that the night vision is terrible. I can walk directly in front of the camera with the lights off and will detect my movement.
customer_reviews.author: J. Timothy Russell

customer_reviews.title: Camera is working great so far
customer_reviews.text: Camera is working great so far! Facial recognition seems to work fairly well, doesn't recognize 100% of the time though, but that's ok with me. Love it's small footprint and that it will pretty much videotape an entire room.
customer_reviews.author: joiefae

customer_reviews.title: Great camera - the best on the market.
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great - as promised. I had ordered two different ones and sent the other one back. This is the best one out there. Night vision, facial recognition. For some reason, mine has been picking up orbs in the middle of the night. Not sure what to think about that.
customer_reviews.author: Truth Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Product setup and installation with the app were easy. Just installed and pleased thus far with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Product setup and installation with the app were easy. Just installed and pleased thus far with the capabilities of this unit. Rather than drillng and placing screws in the mounting surfaces, I used adhesive backed velcro, which was helpful after changing the location multiple times to get the right placement. I would prefer a longer cord if I had any product recommendations versus having to use a thicker extension cord for such a small AC cord. Overall, I've been pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Home Mod OT

customer_reviews.title: Works very good, have this watching my thermostat in my second ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very good, have this watching my thermostat in my second home and the motion sensor sends alerts with a vidieo like it should when my lights go on and off with the timer. A piece of mind for a reasonable price and no worries on pipes freezing up. Just a quick fix till I get smart thermostats.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen L. Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Learn how it works right away ( with the notifications)
customer_reviews.text: I started using this as soon as I received it. Three weeks later my house was broken into. This little device was able to clearly identify them. Even the police were very impressed with the clarity. The negative is that their are glitches in the software so sometimes it takes a while to connect. Sometimes you have to restart the phone to get it to connect. Other than that - it’s fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: this is an excellent choice. I use it as part of a ...
customer_reviews.text: What sets this camera apart is the quality of the app and the free online storage. I wish it swiveled electronically, but for the price, this is an excellent choice. I use it as part of a home built security system.
customer_reviews.author: David Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Works well. I chose NOT to upgrade the firmware ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I chose NOT to upgrade the firmware after reading of problems with doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: ... check to see if motion was detected There are better ones out there for around the same
customer_reviews.text: OK live video quality Does not alert by email' You have to log in to their app to check to see if motion was detected There are better ones out there for around the same cost
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Night Vision does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Night Vision does not work at all. The videos all went to grayscale after the first two days. I contacted tech support, and the recommendation was another installation. I have deleted and installed three times with no change in the outcome!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: I bought 3 - recommend to friends!
customer_reviews.text: Value for money is great. I can see what's going on in my house as can my wife. You can set notifications to only come during times you are not there - so I can see what time the cleaning lady comes and make sure it's her... etc.
customer_reviews.author: Truth Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Great Wi-fi cvamera for the price - easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Great Wi-Fi camera for the price - easy setup - easy operation - does exactly what we need t to do - sound capture not real great - otherwise very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Feeman

customer_reviews.title: Great security camera
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up my 3rd camera in one year (I use all 3) great night vision and motion sensor makes it easy to go back and review
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Photo quality is good, notification are so so but functional
customer_reviews.text: For the cost and the fact these are indoor cameras they work well beyond their price range. No issues setting them up just be sure you have enough bandwidth on your 2.4 router leg. Photo quality is good, notification are so so but functional. Overall I would recommend these for anyone wanting a cost effective camera.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product and value
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed by this camera. There is no reason to buy a Nest when you have this for a fraction of the price AND free online storage. I'm planning on buying 1 or 2 more, at this price why not.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martens

customer_reviews.title: Really Good and Affordable Camera System for Those on a Budget
customer_reviews.text: Really good product and awesome deal. So far my experiences most pleased with: easy setup, images clear, instant alerts, and up to week free storage. The only area for improvement is the need to reset power from time to time due to loss of Wifi signal. Great review article by Samuel Cook "Tend Secure Lynx Indoor Camera Hands-On Review". I also like that he also tries to answer questions in comments section.
customer_reviews.author: Dot C.

customer_reviews.title: Never connected at all!!!
customer_reviews.text: Did everything I could too get this too work. I know what I’m doing. I have 3 other ones
customer_reviews.author: FreddieAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Constant Struggle
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these cameras in my house and it's been a constant struggle to keep them running. All three are within 6 feet of a router (I purchased WIFI extenders just for the cameras) when they work I'm satisfied with the image and recordings. I've also found that unplugging and waiting does not work. I need to push the reset on the back of the camera and reset them up.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Howard

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, there are better options out there.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay I guess, the app and setup process are annoying. Especially if you have Android and Apple devices. If you set it up on one the other doesn't like to recognize it.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: The picture was very clear
customer_reviews.text: One of the 10 units that we got had static on the speaker. The set up was not user-friendly, no phone number was provided email for tech-support.
customer_reviews.author: David.Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera, terrible app
customer_reviews.text: The camera itself is fine - compact, easy to set up. But the app is pretty terrible. It doesn't work half the time.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Setup - Good APP
customer_reviews.text: I use this one indoors. Simple camera. Easy to set up. Top quality video feed. APP lets me watch my dog from anywhere. For the price, I plan to put one outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: hope coman

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't always work the way I need it to. The sound quality is horrible. Sometimes the picture quality is horrible, sometimes it's good. The price was pretty good, so I guess it comes down to getting what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: grand kid spoiler

customer_reviews.title: Great support desk!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps a record in the cloud included with the price. Not easy to set up with a dish, but great once set up.
customer_reviews.author: Frank R

customer_reviews.title: If the pi UI’s What’s important to you, this is ok.
customer_reviews.text: Picture Works great. Had to return first one, sound has loud static. The replacement was just as bad. Just bad sound.
customer_reviews.author: NickR27

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable piece of junk.
customer_reviews.text: Seller was great! Product was terrible. Would drop off and on the router. Company said it was my configuration. I'm an I.T. guy. I promise it wasn't my config. Had to have it within 15 feet, direct sight of router, and it was still unreliable. Had it for a couple of months, now it doesn't power up at all. Junk. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: FishND

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to set up, no subscriptions and it works.
customer_reviews.text: It's working perfectly so far. Set up is easy, internet connection is sometimes laggy, but it records events perfectly and sends notifications in seconds. After buying and testing one cam I bought the second one. Now using both of them. For a low end security cam it definitely meets my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: damjan vahtar

customer_reviews.title: Tend insight Products
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Tend Indoor for a few years now and decided to purchase another camera. Got it connected in no time and use it as my portable/mobile camera to put as I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good camera for the money.
customer_reviews.text: It has been working really good for me for almost 2 years now. picture quality is good not great. but for the price I really cant complain.
customer_reviews.author: Teck K

customer_reviews.title: Keeps going offline
customer_reviews.text: Camera keeps going offline and will not connect to my wifi. I deleted the camera and tried to add the camera through the app But it would not connect To the Lynx network It just sits there and never responds back . Lynx Support is the worse No one ever answers the phone And when you do get ahold of someone there First response is always to reboot the router you can't always reboot your router. I would not recommend this camera
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best value out there for a darn good camera and peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy setup. Good quality video, but sound isn't terrific. Love the free 7 day cloud storage. I do wish there were a web client for monitoring, rather than mobile app only. Cannot beat this camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Risa Legg

customer_reviews.title: ... a very clear camera works very well couldn't be happier from work I can keep an eye on my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very clear camera works very well couldn't be happier from work I can keep an eye on my dog and everything else only live a half a mile from work so if he gets into something it shows me and I can come home and get him out of it and if see someone else besides me it lets me know by phone it's an awesome product
customer_reviews.author: harshawc

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to install and use. Very good quality images and features.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great but tech support is little to non existent
customer_reviews.author: Joe Home Owner

customer_reviews.title: Lack of supported Wifi speed
customer_reviews.text: No 5ghz support. No special character support for connecting to WIFI. No mention of these issues prior to purchase. Doesn’t matter how good product is if you can’t connect it
customer_reviews.author: Richard D Waldrop

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This camera is worth every penny. Easy to install. Picture quality is good. I’m very pleased with product.
customer_reviews.author: Pooh Waltrip

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Expectations
customer_reviews.text: This camera was exactly what we were looking for! It was so simple to set up, easy to use, and the picture is great quality. I would recommend this to anyone who is in search of getting their money’s worth with a security camera.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M.

customer_reviews.title: No connection
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't connect to WEP enabled wifi. Even with the camera right next to router.
customer_reviews.author: ClubberLang

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, great price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera for the money!! If you’re having a tough time setting up on iPhone, there’s a setting you have to change on your phone. Just call tend and they’ll walk you through it.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: No issues or concerns, works nicely.....
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, I unplugged 3 separate times, camera reconnected to WiFi, I rebooted WiFi, reconnected automatically, works real nice, easy access to past motion videos. Will be buying 3 more shortly. Just had it a week, .... Just wanted to try one first.......
customer_reviews.author: Maureen D.

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a camera that works really well. The setup was really easy and I love looking at my home when I'm at work or out. I'm going to get a few more, maybe even as Christmas gifts for my parents and sister.
customer_reviews.author: JanB

customer_reviews.title: Camera works great as a baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: Camera works great as a baby monitor, but I was disappointed that you have to register it to their cloud service. The service is free, but it's the only way to view the camera, and I worry about not being able to lock it down to just my internal network.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: I like it but...
customer_reviews.text: Camera works well but I have needed to reconnect a bunch of times. Problem is the speaker only worked for about 2 months. Now it's impossible to understand. So if you just want the camera part it's great
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Drechsel

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for a great price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is incredible! Easy to use and seamless app! I love these cameras I have 4 of them!
customer_reviews.author: Usmarine13007

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable.
customer_reviews.text: This unit lost connection at least once a week and needed to be unplugged to reconnect. Now, after 7 months, it failed completely! Will not reconnect!
customer_reviews.author: Mike B Senior

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera with free 7 day cloud storage!  Super wide angle field of view and super sharp image!
customer_reviews.text: Just a heads up that you can in fact wall mount this camera. The key is to remove the little screw on the bottom, then twist off the little plastic keyhole wall mount bracket, and then completely remove the metal plate (which I believe is intended to be a weight to hold the camera in place in a surface mount scenario). When you do this any normal screw should work for the keyhole mounts on the little plastic wall mount bracket. I have done this and have it mounted outside under an eve with the power cord running down to an exterior power outlet. It has worked great for me!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed, it stopped working after using for a few times, and the app stopped connecting with the camera!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonoholic

customer_reviews.title: Naww
customer_reviews.text: Good camera, but no way to mass download feed and once feed is deleted, it is gone. Go with Arlo
customer_reviews.author: Toree

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my 500sqft studio apartment. I can’t control when the camera displays color vs. black & white, but otherwise it’s a good value. I don’t have it mounted due to the limitations many have noted. Motion notifications are annoying unless you only turn them on when you go out of town.
customer_reviews.author: Emmyph

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Works great, at a reasonable price. Compared to a camera twice the price, the biggest difference is less wide angle. Very generous cloud storage. I'd buy again for additional cameras.
customer_reviews.author: dp

customer_reviews.title: I see you
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!! I spy on my dog all the time Covers big area
customer_reviews.author: ie

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: What I like most is it's easy to use nice picture. And set up is fairly easy! What I don't like is only one person can sign in and view at a time and it is limited on what you can set for notifications
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: horrible sound, it disconnects when you move the camera...even when the camera is 2 feet from the router....great picture resolution...the camera freezes up constantly
customer_reviews.author: Scott Turner

customer_reviews.title: Good value but if you can spend more look for ...
customer_reviews.text: Looses internet. Not sure it’s the an issue with my network or the unit. I did have to re-configure twice. Good value but if you can spend more look for another one.
customer_reviews.author: T. Franchina

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay online
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a few weeks then dropped the in the ability
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. You can control everything via WiFi on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. You can control everything via WiFi on your reef tank but there is nothing like being able to see everything as a great help when you are away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This is junk. Worked for the first month then died. Have followed all the instructions still nothing. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. Purchased it to overlook my parking lot and it has worked like a dream. I setup it up to record motion and to send me notifications when it detects motion. It works as advertised. It is super easy to setup as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great price and does the job
customer_reviews.text: Using to watch my pups. Perfect picture, easy set up and a great app. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Evanich

product_meta.title: Tend Insights Lynx Indoor 1080P Wifi Home Security Camera With Night Vision And Facial Recognition White
product_meta.description:
Designed to make securing the people, places and things that matter most incredibly simple with powerful and sophisticated technology, the new Tend secure lynx indoor camera offers the perfect combination of intelligent, yet effortless, video security. Featuring crystal clear 1080p HD live video and audio streaming, Tend secure lynx indoor provides a smart video monitoring solution that pairs effortlessly with any existing Wi-Fi network for easy set up in just minutes. Lynx indoor can easily be placed or mounted anywhere with no complicated wiring for 24-hour day- and Nighttime (infrared) monitoring. Multiple lynx indoor cameras can also be installed on the same network to monitor different rooms, entryways or other locations around the home or business workspace. Lynx indoor’s built-in, advanced facial recognition technology automatically recognizes familiar faces to maximize security and eliminate false alarms. Perfect for keeping an eye on children or elders left home alone, simply use the free Tend secure app (for iOS and Android) to preload images of familiar faces. Once configured , Tend secure issues a mobile check-in notification with familiar faces, or if unfamiliar faces are detected users can get an alert notification and immediately see a live stream of the activity. In addition to live video streaming and still image capture, users can also use lynx indoor’s two-way audio system to communicate with loved ones, pets or other occupants via the Tend secure mobile app. The system comes with a lifetime free seven-day cloud storage; all captured video and audio are saved automatically and stored for up to seven days on Tend insight’s cloud-based servers for secure access from anywhere using the Tend secure mobile app. With the Tend secure lynx indoor, you can always Tend to what matters most.



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 




FACIAL RECOGNITION Lynx Indoor’s built-in intelligent facial recognition software automatically recognizes familiar faces to maximize security and eliminate false alarms. Choose who your camera recognizes by preloading images. Get check-in notifications with familiar faces and alert notifications with unknown faces.

FREE 7-DAY VIDEO CLOUD STORAGE All captured video and audio are saved automatically and stored for up to seven days on Tend’s cloud-based servers for secure access from anywhere using the Tend Secure Mobile App. It’s free and never expires, so you can always see what’s happened for the past 7 days for added peace of mind.




Easy Setup With quick and easy setup, and no additional or hidden subscription fees, you can start using your Lynx right away.

Instant Alerts Get immediate notifications for events triggered by motion detection. Access live video streaming and recording from anywhere in the world.

Unlimited Cameras Connected unlimited cameras to your Tend Secure App to watch over all that matters - with no extra cost. You can even share your camera with others.




With top quality and cutting-edge features, Lynx Indoor makes its easy to tend to what matters most.
feature_bullets: Intelligent facial recognition software to choose who your camera recognizes
Crystal clear 1080P HD live video streaming with night vision to monitor in complete darkness
Free & secure lifetime 7 day cloud storage and viewing angle is 125 degree diagonal
Two way audio, motion detection and instant alerts

Built in support for 802.11b/g/n 2.4Ghz Wifi band (5Ghz currently not supported, please confirm that your router supports 2.4Ghz Wifi Band); Access your camera with the Tend Secure App on your mobile device anytime, anywhere
